<script>
$(function (){

	setExternalLinkPopUp()
})
function setExternalLinkPopUp() {

	$.each($('.wrapper a'), function (index, item) {
		if (!$(this).hasClass('no-popup')) {
			if (typeof $(this).attr('href') != 'undefined' && $(this).attr('href') != null) {
				var href = $(this).attr('href')
					/*href = href.replace(/\s/g, '');*/
	
				if (href.indexOf('hsbc.com') <= 0 && href.charAt(0) != '/' && href.charAt(0) != '?' && href.substring(0, 4) != 'java' && href != '#' && href.substring(0, 1) != '#' && href.substring(0, 3) != 'tel' && href.substring(0, 4) != 'mail') {
					$(this).addClass('external-link');
				}
				if (href.indexOf('payme.notey.com') > -1) {
					$(this).removeClass('external-link');
				}
			}

			// Add aria-label
			if ($(this).attr("target") == "_blank") {
				var openNewWindow = "(Opens in a new window)";
				switch ($("html").attr("lang")) {
					case "zh-hk":
						openNewWindow = "「在新視窗中打開」";
						break;
					case "zh-cn":
						openNewWindow = "\"在新视窗中打开\"";
						break;
				}
				$(this).attr("aria-label", $(this).html() + " " + openNewWindow);
				
			}
		}
		
	})


	if ((typeof heading!=='undefined') && (typeof content!=='undefined') && (typeof cancel!=='undefined') && (typeof understand!=='undefined')) {
		var html = $('<div class="external-link-popup"><div class="content"><a class="close-btn" href="javascript:void(0);" role="button"><i aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-delete "></i><span class="mobile-accessibleHidden">Close</span></a><h3>' + heading + '</h3><p>' + content + '</p><div class="buttons"><a id="cancel-btn" class="btn-red" href="javascript:void(0);">' + cancel + '</a><a id="go-btn" class="btn-red" href="#" target="_blank">' + understand + '</a></div></div></div>')
		html.appendTo($('body'))
	}


	$('.external-link').click(function (e) {
		e.preventDefault()
		var index = $(".external-link").index(this);
		var link = $(this).attr('href')
		openExternalLinkPopUp(link, index)
	})

	$('.external-link-popup a#cancel-btn, .external-link-popup a.close-btn').click(function () {
		closeExternalLinkPopUp()
	})

	$(document).on('keydown', '.external-link-popup a#go-btn', function (e) {
		if (e.keyCode == 9) {
			if (e.shiftKey) {} else {
				$('.external-link-popup a.close-btn').focus()
				return false;
			}
		}
	});
	$(document).on('keydown', '.external-link-popup a.close-btn', function (e) {
		if (e.keyCode == 9) {
			if (e.shiftKey) {
				$('.external-link-popup a#go-btn').focus()
				return false;
			} else {}
		}
	});
	$(document).keyup(function (e) {
		if (e.keyCode === 27) {
			closeExternalLinkPopUp()
		}
	});
}

function openExternalLinkPopUp(link, index) {
	$('body').addClass('noScroll')
	$('.external-link-popup').attr('data-index', index).fadeIn(function () {
		$('.external-link-popup a.close-btn').focus()
		$('.external-link-popup a#go-btn').attr('href', link)
	})
	return false;
}

function closeExternalLinkPopUp() {
	if ($('.transitional-external-popup').length > 0)
	{
		history.back()
	}
	else
	{
		var index = $('.external-link-popup').attr('data-index')
		$('body').removeClass('noScroll')
		$('.external-link-popup').fadeOut(function () {
			$('.external-link').eq(index).focus()
		})
	}
}
</script>

</div>

<div class="debitCardIntroductionText">有滙豐理財戶口，你就可以喺我哋嘅龐大商戶網絡，自動享受唔同類型嘅精選優惠，由日常消費到休閒娛樂，由本地到世界各地，都全面覆蓋。唔講你唔知，我哋嘅合作商戶門市已經超過10,000間，只要係滙豐客戶就可以enjoy more！</div>

<div class="itemTitle">一系列醫療服務優惠，幫你track住你嘅健康！</div>
<div class="discount">有健康嘅體魄先可以做理財世一。身為滙豐One客戶，你同你嘅家人仲可以享有醫療服務優惠！<br>
<ul>
<li>去指定私家醫院做身體檢查，可享低至47折</li>

</ul>

<h2 class="red-section-header" style="margin-bottom: 20px;">你也可能對以下內容感興趣</h2>
<div class="title">滙豐One</div>
<div class="content">「滙豐One」幫你全方位掌握消費、儲蓄、投資、定期存款需要，更享全面理財總值零要求。想即刻體驗？用5分鐘<sup>^</sup>喺手機開戶就掂晒！</div>
<a href="https://www.hsbc.com.hk/zh-hk/accounts/products/one/#steps" target="_blank" data-pid="BUTTON_HSBC_HKG_WPB_BANKINGUSAGE_ONE_APPLYNOW" aria-label="立即開戶<span class="arrow"></span> 「在新視窗中打開」">立即開戶<span class="arrow"></span></a>
<div class="title">滙豐卓越理財</div>
<div class="content">滙豐卓越理財為您提供度身而設的財富管理服務及環球理財支援，讓您在每個關鍵時刻，敢於踏出每一步，為家人作出重大的決定。</div>
<a href="https://www.hsbc.com.hk/zh-hk/premier/#join-premier-today" target="_blank" data-pid="BUTTON_HSBC_HKG_WPB_BANKINGUSAGE_PREMIER_APPLYNOW" aria-label="加入滙豐卓越理財<span class="arrow"></span> 「在新視窗中打開」">加入滙豐卓越理財<span class="arrow"></span></a>
<div class="title">滙豐Mastercard®扣賬卡</div>
<div class="content">有滙豐Mastercard®扣賬卡，簽賬可享無上限0.4%現金回贈。一卡在手，你還可以隨時隨地使用12種主要貨幣進行網購、商店消費、或於海外HSBC ATM提款，並無任何手續費！立即申請！</div>
<a href="https://www.hsbc.com.hk/zh-hk/debit-cards/products/mastercard-debit-card/" target="_blank" data-pid="BUTTON_HSBC_HKG_WPB_BANKINGUSAGE_MCDC_EXPLOREMORE" aria-label="探索Mastercard®扣賬卡<span class="arrow"></span> 「在新視窗中打開」">探索Mastercard®扣賬卡<span class="arrow"></span></a>
<div class="title">滙豐信用卡</div>
<div class="content">滙豐信用卡為你帶來更多優惠及豐富獎賞，即時申請更可享高達$1,000「獎賞錢」迎新禮遇！受條款及細則約束。</div>
<a href="https://www.hsbc.com.hk/zh-hk/credit-cards/apply/" target="_blank" data-pid="BUTTON_HSBC_HKG_WPB_BANKINGUSAGE_CREDITCARD_APPLYNOW" aria-label="立即申請<span class="arrow"></span> 「在新視窗中打開」">立即申請<span class="arrow"></span></a>

</div>
